teams.name: Compadres
teams.loan_because: Subscribing to the core micro-lending philosophy, we support and encourage entrepreneurs in starting small businesses in Third World countries.
teams.description: Our non-profit foundation provides interest free startup capital (loans) to women in Third World countries.

teams.loan_because: God has given to us and He has asked us to give to others.
teams.description: A group of Christians who care and want to share.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
